sentences.en: a diamond in the rough.
sentences.cn: 一个未经琢磨的钻石。

sentences.en: A fishing vessel and a cargo ship collided in rough seas.
sentences.cn: 一艘捕鱼船和一艘货船在波涛汹涌的海上相撞了。

sentences.en: a rough translation
sentences.cn: 粗略的翻译

sentences.en: a rough-and-ready estimating method.
sentences.cn: 一种粗糙但切实的估计方法。

sentences.en: A thin, glistening thread of moisture ran along the rough concrete sill.
sentences.cn: 在粗糙不平的水泥窗台上有一条细细的发光水印。

sentences.en: even before the recession hit, the project was in the rough.
sentences.cn: 甚至在遭受经济衰退袭击之前，这个项目已经处于困境了。

sentences.en: Her hands were rough from hard work.
sentences.cn: 她的双手因为干重活而变得很粗糙。

sentences.en: His bare feet were smooth on top and rough-skinned underneath.
sentences.cn: 他赤裸的双脚脚面很光滑，脚底却很粗糙。

sentences.en: I don’t mind roughing it for a while.
sentences.cn: 偶尔艰苦一下，我无所谓。

sentences.en: I've got a rough idea of what he looks like.
sentences.cn: 我已经大致知道他长什么样子了。

sentences.en: It was quite a rough part of our town.
sentences.cn: 这是我们城里犯罪率很高的地区。

sentences.en: It was quite rough at times, and she was seasick.
sentences.cn: 有时海上波涛汹涌，她就会晕船。

sentences.en: It’s been rough going , but we’ve almost finished now.
sentences.cn: 很费劲，不过我们现在基本上已经完成了。

sentences.en: My boyfriend and I were going through a rough patch .
sentences.cn: 我和我的男朋友之间有点麻烦。

sentences.en: My late teens and early twenties were really rough years.
sentences.cn: 我二十岁前后那几年过得真苦啊。

sentences.en: rebel shareholders are expected to &B{give} officials &B{a rough ride}.
sentences.cn: 反叛的股东预计要把高级行政人员折腾一番。

sentences.en: She passed the needle through the rough cloth, back and forth.
sentences.cn: 她一针一针地缝那块粗布。

sentences.en: Sounds like you had a rough day .
sentences.cn: 听上去你这一天很不顺。

sentences.en: The bill is in for a rough ride in the Senate.
sentences.cn: 这项议案在参议院受阻。

sentences.en: The company I work for went through a rough patch.
sentences.cn: 我所在的公司经历了一段困难时期。

sentences.en: The dogs made a noise, a rough, grumbling sound.
sentences.cn: 这些狗发出刺耳的低吼声。

sentences.en: The first year was rough, but things have gotten better.
sentences.cn: 第一年很艰难，但现在已经好起来了。

sentences.en: The new e-books will include a host of Rough Guide titles.
sentences.cn: 新电子书将包括大量的简明指南。

sentences.en: The Rough Guide to Nepal is a comprehensive guide to the region.
sentences.cn: 《尼泊尔概况》是一本全面介绍该地区的旅游指南。

sentences.en: The rough rock walls were like the sides of a deep canal.
sentences.cn: 凸凹不平的石墙就像一条很深的运河的河岸。

sentences.en: the rough terrain at the base of the mountains
sentences.cn: 山脚下崎岖不平的地形

sentences.en: The show, despite some rough edges, was an instant success.
sentences.cn: 虽然有一些瑕疵，演出还是一举获得了成功。

sentences.en: They were rough kids, and thought we were sissies.
sentences.cn: 他们那帮孩子野蛮得很，还认为我们太女孩子气。

sentences.en: We were bumping over the rough ground .
sentences.cn: 我们在崎岖的地面上颠簸而行。

sentences.en: We were bumping over the rough ground.
sentences.cn: 我们在崎岖的地面上颠簸而行。

sentences.en: We’ve been through some rough times together.
sentences.cn: 我们曾经共渡难关。

sentences.en: you two stop quarrelling or you'll get the rough edge of my tongue.
sentences.cn: 你们俩别争吵了，否则你们要挨我的痛骂。

words.tran_cn: 略粗糙的；略粗暴的；有点刺耳的；略有风浪的
粗饲料；粗粮；粗糙的原料
粗糙（度）；粗暴；猛烈；篷乱毛发；未加工
艰苦；高低不平的地面；未经加工的材料；粗糙的部分

phrases.tran_cn: 艰难时期；艰难进程；艰难经历
(非正式)（以强壮和粗犷吸引人的）男性性伙伴
未经琢磨的钻石；外粗内秀的人
粗糙但有效的，粗糙但尚能顶用的
(澳／新西兰，非正式)缺少教养的；粗鄙的；鄙俗的
内质网；糙面内质网，粗面型内质网
大浪；狂浪；风大浪急的海面
(非正式)用暴力对待，向…动粗；狠揍
喧闹的行为；粗鲁的行为，暴力行为
不平地形，地形条件恶劣地区

phrases.phrase: take the rough with the smooth
phrases.tran_cn: 既能享乐也能吃苦；好事和坏事都受得了

phrases.phrase: the rough edge (或side) of one's tongue

trans.tran_cn: 粗糙的，不平的，粗略的，粗暴的，危险的，汹涌的，有暴风雨的，艰难的，不适的，味道差的
trans.tran_en: a rough period is one in which you have a lot of problems or difficulties
to live for a short time in conditions that are not very comfortable
